title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Mathematical Information Literacy Competencies Using Critical Digital Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental mathematical concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate mathematical information sources in digital environments and select credible resources
Learners can navigate and apply mathematical Open Educational Resources (OER) using academic library systems
Learners can share mathematical problem-solving processes with peers via online collaborative tools and provide critical feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
